title: elouz
author: elouz
content: Hello everone , i've been looking to trade some gift cards , i found some good market places and i wanna know if there is  any better options in terms of fees ,  currently using buysellvouchers.com and eneba..i would like to know more , thanks

comments.author: Nwada001
comments.body: The market will depend on which country's currency you want to exchange.You have to be specific about which currency you want to exchange your Bitcoin for; you can even find a dealer here on the forum.

comments.author: Jon_Hodl
comments.body: Not sure what market you are working in but I think that RoboSats is quickly becoming the best place to buy/sell bitcoin. Not sure how well most gift cards can be used on there but I think it has the potential to change how gift cards and bitcoin are exchanged. Not sure if you are mostly looking to buy or sell gift cards but I know that BitRefill is one of the best options for global gift card sales with bitcoin as a means of payment.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: I am not a fan of gift card trading because many risk with this trading type: scam, fake invoice, rip off, etc.[LIST] Gift cards providers can help you with a longer list of Gift card trading platforms which I personally would not prefer to use. I don't prioritize margin profit if I have to sacrifice safety.https://noones.com/https://civkit.org/They are two new born platforms after Paxful had internal conflicts between Ray and Artur. Considering about risk when you trade on these new platforms.

comments.author: Potato Chips
comments.body: You could also try making an offer on our Digital Goods board, see: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?board=93.0But given your rank/reputation, you'll have to rely on established escrows to make it easier for people to trust you, see list: https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=276897.0

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: What type of gift card do you plan to sell? If it's a crypto-related stuff like Binance and Coinbase gift card I think g2a is a great option look there are many sellers here https://www.g2a.com/best-deals/bitcoin-gift-cardsIf you want to start selling gift cards there check this guide "How To Sell".Fees are 10.8% + €0.35 it's included already on the final price of your product a bit high but the good thing is they do support bitcoin payment.

comments.author: drwhobox
comments.body: Never did any business with them, but you have to make sure they stick with their words. There are so many scam sites who are stealing money from people. Did a research which site is good for you before taking any steps.

comments.author: pakhitheboss
comments.body: Gift cards are country specific, you have not mentioned in the topic about the country. Please clarify the information and then we can help you further. Within the forum there is a child board digital goods, you can create a topic about the same with detailed information. If someone is interested they will contact you. As your forum account rank is newbie you would need to an escrow service provider for selling your gift cards in return for Bitcoin.

comments.author: 348Judah
comments.body: Quote from: elouz on June 13, 2023, 05:16:14 PMSnipIf what you're looking for is where you can sell your gift cards and receives payment in bitcoin then that's very simple, you can make use of two options here, make use of an exchange for that, some microfinance banks also have the features for that but am not sure of they must pay through bitcoin when they link you up, you can as well create a thread here on the request or check for other existing threads are on this from service board and only have deal with a trusted and reputable members of the forum,ore preferably the DT for security reasons.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: I personally know about Bitrefill.com and coinsbee.com, and they are popular as well, though I am sure how their fees compare to the service you are talking about in the OP. It looks like you are going to have to manually compare the prices of the above service with the one you have been using.

comments.author: Obari
comments.body: Quote from: elouz on June 13, 2023, 05:16:14 PMHello everone , i've been looking to trade some gift cards , i found some good market places and i wanna know if there is  any better options in terms of fees ,  currently using buysellvouchers.com and eneba..i would like to know more , thanksI also trade gift cards.All country gift cards as well as Roblox gift cards and I have very nice and Interesting rates and I'm sure you'll love it.Feel free to send me a pm and I will  be glad to be your surest vendor as my rates are very friendly and attractive and I also pay in usdt and bitcoin  as well.Below is the link to my gift card trade thread.https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5421431.msg61302645#msg61302645It will be wise that I let you know that rates are dependent on the country card you have and also the type  of card you have (E-codes or physical ) cards.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: It turns out, buysellvouchers.com is employing a shilling and spamming tactic using newbie accounts pretending to be asking for help. They have been doing a simillar thing since April using different accounts in different boards.Now you know why you shouldn't trust buysellvouchers.com 1. abdullah21Quote from: abdullah21 on June 09, 2023, 07:43:51 PMکیا کسی کو گفٹ کارڈ مارکیٹ پلیس کے بارے میں معلوم ہے جس کی فیس Buysellvouchers.com سے کم ہے 0.4% خریداروں کے لیے اور 0.3% بیچنے والوں کے لیے کرپٹو کے ساتھ تجارت کرنے کے لیے؟Quote from: abdullah21 on June 16, 2023, 06:05:54 PMI have some gift cards of my own. I want to sell them in a website called buysellvouchers.com , They are taking lower fees from sellers . Any seller from this website or which website will better for me ?2. Aisorjo27Quote from: Aisorjo27 on April 26, 2023, 11:01:49 AMকেউ কি আমাকে গুগল গিফ্ট কার্ড কেনা বেচার জন্য buysellvouchers.com এর মতো প্লাটফর্ম খুঁজে দিতে পারবেন ? যারা কিনা কম চার্জ নেবে বাইসেল ভাওচার এর মতো ০.৪% বিক্রেতা ও ০.৩% ক্রেতার জন্য । Quote from: Aisorjo27 on May 11, 2023, 08:04:17 PMI want to start trading with crypto in kinguin.net and buysellvouchers.com ! they are selling gift card at a lower price . 0.4% fees for buyer and 0.3% for seller .. which is a great deal . Anyone tried this website before ? 3. elouzQuote from: elouz on June 13, 2023, 05:16:14 PMHello everone , i've been looking to trade some gift cards , i found some good market places and i wanna know if there is  any better options in terms of fees ,  currently using buysellvouchers.com and eneba..i would like to know more , thanks4. Tahmid2005https://ninjastic.space/post/62320436

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: elouz on June 13, 2023, 05:16:14 PMHello everone , i've been looking to trade some gift cards , i found some good market places and i wanna know if there is  any better options in terms of fees ,  currently using buysellvouchers.com and eneba..i would like to know more , thanksYou can always offer to sell your gift cards here in bitcointalk marketplace section, and for purchasing cards I know several websites that work very good.Bitrefill and The Bitcoin Company are currently one of the best options for purchasing gift cards with bitcoin without kyc verification.There are also some P2P websites who offered gift cards trading but I never used them so I can't say more about them.Note that most of this websites are centralized services so be careful when you use them.

comments.author: elouz
comments.body: Quote from: Nwada001 on June 13, 2023, 05:30:04 PMThe market will depend on which country's currency you want to exchange.You have to be specific about which currency you want to exchange your Bitcoin for; you can even find a dealer here on the forum.i mainly go for us & uk ..but sometimes European cards too

comments.author: elouz
comments.body: Quote from: BitMaxz on June 13, 2023, 09:57:47 PMWhat type of gift card do you plan to sell? If it's a crypto-related stuff like Binance and Coinbase gift card I think g2a is a great option look there are many sellers here https://www.g2a.com/best-deals/bitcoin-gift-cardsIf you want to start selling gift cards there check this guide "How To Sell".Fees are 10.8% + €0.35 it's included already on the final price of your product a bit high but the good thing is they do support bitcoin payment.i'm already registered but i think to be a seller you must have an LTD or an LLC not sure , i just remember that i didn't fit the requirements(sadly)

comments.author: BitMaxz
comments.body: Quote from: elouz on June 26, 2023, 12:00:07 AMi'm already registered but i think to be a seller you must have an LTD or an LLC not sure , i just remember that i didn't fit the requirements(sadly) Are you verified? It requires KYC and it looks like they also ask for business verification that requires some documents listed in this link below.- https://supporthub.g2a.com/seller/en/getting-started/business-verification-and-business-accounts-on-g2acom-marketplaceIf you can provide those documents there you can be a seller.

comments.author: bettercrypto
comments.body: Quote from: elouz on June 13, 2023, 05:16:14 PMHello everone , i've been looking to trade some gift cards , i found some good market places and i wanna know if there is  any better options in terms of fees ,  currently using buysellvouchers.com and eneba..i would like to know more , thanksI think it's better for gamers, but I don't think non-online gamers will pay much attention to it. But that's okay, because the merchant market is online gamers who have a lot of choices to choose from.And then the adoption is still the best thing about that gift card. I hope the time will come to have a gift card for the prime commodities that we people need in our daily lives. At least in this matter we are slowly entering the digital worlds of payments.

It requires KYC and it looks like they also ask for business verification that requires some documents listed in this link below.- https://supporthub.g2a.com/seller/en/getting-started/business-verification-and-business-accounts-on-g2acom-marketplaceIf you can provide those documents there you can be a seller.i'm verified but now i need to create a limited company ,so i can room freely in the website ^^

comments.author: Nrcewker
comments.body: Quote from: elouz on June 13, 2023, 05:16:14 PMHello everone , i've been looking to trade some gift cards , i found some good market places and i wanna know if there is  any better options in terms of fees ,  currently using buysellvouchers.com and eneba..i would like to know more , thanksTo be honest, I haven’t heard about these two platforms that you have mentioned. Maybe, I don’t deal with gift cards frequently hence not aware of those. I can only suggest you from my own experience. I previously tried localbitcoins and paxful for these type of deals. Now localbitcoins is closed, hence paxful is the only option left. Paxful is in the business from many years, hence very trusted, so yes do checkout that marketplace and do trade with calculating the fees and risks involved.

comments.author: notocactus
comments.body: Quote from: Nrcewker on June 29, 2023, 05:00:22 PMI previously tried localbitcoins and paxful for these type of deals. Now localbitcoins is closed, hence paxful is the only option left. Paxful is in the business from many years, hence very trusted, so yes do checkout that marketplace and do trade with calculating the fees and risks involved.Paxful closed their service but re-opened it recent weeks. They are gradually reopening their business in the USA, state by state. It seems they are doing it slowly with progress from their Law and Compliance teams.Some platforms to trade giftcards.[LIST] Gift cards providers.https://noones.com/
